I bought this for my boyfriend, who hasn’t purchased new clothing in twenty years. You’re saying to yourself “Wow. He must be pretty svelte and fit if he can fit into twenty year clothing.” He is. Almost embarrassingly so. Thin, tight, trim. Never works out. On a burger and pizza regime. It’s his first new shirt in years, and it looked hot. Felt like quality material. He wore it to one dinner, and I’m sure it will live in the back of a closet for the next ten years. But I’ve banked mental images of that dinner and this shirt for years to come. You should buy it.

评论概述: Sizing is just a tad off
评论详情: For starters, I ordered a Medium and Large but returned both. Now, that's not due to the shirt itself, as I enjoyed the design and fabric (though I found the zipper a bit much in person). Sadly, both shirts were just "off" in how they fit, and there was really no indication that I'd be able to shrink the Large enough to fit, while the Medium was too snug before even a wash. The fabric did feel comfortable and cooling, but I ultimately had to return since neither would sit right on my body.
